item.title: Huawei P9 and India Photo Project introduce Monochrome award in India
item.description:
Source: Instagram. Top Instagram posts for the contest hashtag #ipp_ma2016 at the time of writing. Huawei, in partnership with the Instagram-based India Photo Project, has introduced the “Monochrome” award to commemorate World Photography Day on August 19th. This competition, running from August 20th to August 31st, aims to discover India’s top black and white Instagram photographer. The judging panel comprises Sumit Dayal, recognized as CNN’s Indian Instagrammer of the Year in 2015, Tara Bedi, the first Instagram employee from India, Devika Daulet Singh, Director of PHOTOINK, a prominent photography gallery, and Neeraj Priyadarshini, the Photo Editor at the Indian Express...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/huawei-p9-and-india-photo-project-introduce-monochrome-award-in-india/

item.title: For the fourth year in a row, Konica Minolta has been awarded the prestigious BLI 'Line of the Year' award
item.description:
Buyers Laboratory (BLI), a recognized independent evaluator for the imaging industry, has given Konica Minolta’s A3 multifunction printer (MFP) family its “Line of the Year” award for an unprecedented fourth consecutive year. The “Line of the Year” award is presented annually to companies whose products demonstrate exceptional performance in BLI’s rigorous two-month laboratory assessments. “Konica Minolta’s success comes down to consistency,” said George Mikolay, BLI’s Senior Product Editor for A3/Copier MFPs...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/for-the-fourth-year-in-a-row-konica-minolta-has-been-awarded-the-prestigious-bli-line-of-the-year-award/
